rooms.description: This area includes a reception desk, coat closet, and space for decorative elements adhering to Vastu principles such as a clear view of the entrance.

A spacious living area with an integrated dining space. It features high ceilings, large windows for natural light, and incorporates contemporary design elements while ensuring proper alignment according to Vastu guidelines.

A modern kitchen with an open plan layout that connects seamlessly with the living area. It includes state-of-the-art appliances, ample storage space, and design features ensuring proper energy flow as per Vastu.
The master bedroom is located towards the east to harness positive energy, with an ensuite bathroom and a walk-in closet. The layout respects privacy while adhering to contemporary design aesthetics.
A comfortable guest bedroom located on the north side for positive Vastu flow. It is designed with minimalistic contemporary elements and practical storage solutions.

A dedicated home theater area featuring high-quality audio-visual equipment, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting. The room is designed with acoustics in mind and includes soundproofing measures.
A compact utility space for laundry, storage, and other household functions. This room is located in a less prominent area as per Vastu guidelines to maintain energy balance.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to provide a welcoming entry. It features ample space for natural light and adheres to Vastu principles.
Large windows ensure sufficient daylight in key living spaces and are placed to promote optimal energy flow.
Balconies provide outdoor views and fresh air. They are strategically placed to enhance Vastu balance and aesthetic appeal.
